"ゼッシュレイダの腕刃片の調達":
"I've been thinking I'd like to dress the
place up a bit. Presentation is just as
important as the cooking. I want you to
bring me something that looks like a
knife. I don't actually need a knife,
mind you, I just want something that
LOOKS like an exotic knife to be used
for decoration purposes. Does such a
thing exist?
※Objetivo Nv.47+ Zeshrayda."
